name: Blastlinks (Rhino Mode ON!)
description:
INTRO

The idea of this project was to create a "proof of concept".

During the development we realize that it might have potential and we decided to finish it.

So... here we are 😁

THE GAME (you didn't lose... yet)

Blastlinks is a pixel art Tetris based game.

Your objective is to destroy the blocks to avoid them crossing the line that determines the limit of your machine.

But how do I do that?

You will see blocks that have a color (Blue or Orange). When a blue block meets an orange block (and vice versa) it causes an explosion that will destroy the blocks surrounding them. 

Ok... but how I win the game?

This is an arcade game, but you have an important objective: Write your name as the number ONE in the game, competing with other players to keep your place in the rank.

We hope you guys enjoy the game! 

Controls: A: Move left D: Move right W: Rotate S: Drop ESC: Menu The RMO Team sends the best regards to all of you! 🦏💚
